subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. clarified the score of the Bruins’ second-round victory against the Aggies, saying that the officials waved off Russell Westbrook’s dunk as time expired and that the final was 51-49.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. clarified the score of the Bruins’ second-round victory against the Aggies, saying that the officials waved off Russell Westbrook’s dunk as time expired and that the final was 51-49.
